司公力電学台 TAIWAN POWER COMPANY
39 EAST HUO-PING ROAD SECTION 1
TAIPEI, TAIWAN. CHINA
CABLE ADDRESS:
TAIPOWER
9-248
July 31, 1962
*
Mr. C. Chang, Chief Second Division Council for U. S. Aid Taipei
Subject: Excess Property
Dear Mr. Chang;
We are in receipt of several excess properties listings from AID/China as follows:
Contract Inventory No. 30
Contract Inventory No. 31 Bulletin 3-62 Report No. A-252-62-7187
Report No. A-1-63-AT5022
Report No. A-3-63-AT5022
Report No. A-4-63-AT5022
Report No. A-5-63-AT5022 Report No. A-6-63-AT5022 Catalog 421 -- GP - 11 Catalog 691
to
31/2
After review we have found that some of the items as per the attached lists will be useful to us. Copies of the above listings are also attached for your reference. Please advise us availability and probable date of delivery.
We understand we'll bear the cost of transportation and handling only.
51.8. 1 15133
V.O.
S.G.
2
CUSA
ENCL: cc: AID/C
Yours very truly, TAIWAN POWER COMPANY
L. K . Chen
L. K. Chen Vice President & Chief Engr.

paragraphs.content: 司公力電学台 TAIWAN POWER COMPANY
Mr. C. Chang, Chief Second Division Council for U. S. Aid Taipei
We are in receipt of several excess properties listings from AID/China as follows:
Contract Inventory No. 31 Bulletin 3-62 Report No. A-252-62-7187
Report No. A-5-63-AT5022 Report No. A-6-63-AT5022 Catalog 421 -- GP - 11 Catalog 691

After review we have found that some of the items as per the attached lists will be useful to us. Copies of the above listings are also attached for your reference. Please advise us availability and probable date of delivery.
We understand we'll bear the cost of transportation and handling only.
Yours very truly, TAIWAN POWER COMPANY
L. K. Chen Vice President & Chief Engr.
